statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY phone_number ASC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, o.order_id, o.order_date, c.phone_number FROM customers c LEFT JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_date, order_total FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price, item_quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, item_name, item_price*item_quantity AS total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.order_customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.order_customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 3 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_details.quantity FROM orders JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, order_details.quantity FROM orders JOIN order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id JOIN products ON order_details.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
